welcome_message_body: Welcome to Honcho, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this historic city, known for its beautiful temples, traditional tea houses, and vibrant local markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Honcho has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Haneda Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary international terminal at Haneda Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Haneda Airport

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Narita International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Narita International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal of Narita International Airport, serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Unlimited free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the airport.
